title: The Blueprint For Growing Your Email List Fast
itunes:title: The Blueprint For Growing Your Email List Fast
description:
I wish I got serious about email marketing a lot sooner than I did. It’s the lifeblood to your passive income business.
 
Email marketing is more important than ever with social media platforms killing your organic reach, making you pay to play.
 
In this episode, whether you’re getting into email marketing, just getting started, or been at it for a while, I’m going to give you the blueprint to grow your email list fast.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/161
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178

  3. Join The Elite Underdog Alphas With The Free Underdog Report: https://underdogempowerment.com/report
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
